text: Friendly or flirty? Niall Horan responded to Katy Perry saying that the former One Direction hunk is constantly trying to get her number. Perry ’ s deciding vote pushed Horan forward in the competition, where he was later grouped with Harry Styles, Louis Tomlinson, Liam Payne and Zayn Malik to form One Direction.
